title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
plot: "2001" is a story of evolution. Sometime in the distant past, someone or something nudged evolution by placing a monolith on Earth (presumably elsewhere throughout the universe as well). Evolution then enabled humankind to reach the moon's surface, where yet another monolith is found, one that signals the monolith placers that humankind has evolved that far. Now a race begins between computers (HAL) and human (Bowman) to reach the monolith placers. The winner will achieve the next step in evolution, whatever that may be.
awards: Top Rated Movies #90 | Won 1 Oscar. Another 15 wins & 11 nominations.
stars: Keir Dullea, Gary Lockwood, William Sylvester, Daniel Richter

actorList.name: Ed Bishop
actorList.asCharacter: Aries-1B Lunar Shuttle Captain (as Edward Bishop)

trailer.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
trailer.videoDescription: Humanity finds a mysterious, obviously artificial object buried beneath the Lunar surface and, with the intelligent computer H.A.L. 9000, sets off on a quest.

tagline: An epic drama of adventure and exploration
keywords: monolith,star child,human versus computer,number in title,computer

similars.title: A Clockwork Orange
similars.plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.
similars.stars: Malcolm McDowell, Patrick Magee, Michael Bates

similars.title: Full Metal Jacket
similars.plot: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.
similars.stars: Matthew Modine, R. Lee Ermey, Vincent D'Onofrio

similars.title: The Shining
similars.plot: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.
similars.stars: Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd

similars.title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
similars.fullTitle: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb (1964)
similars.plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a War Room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.
similars.stars: Peter Sellers, George C. Scott, Sterling Hayden

similars.title: 2010: The Year We Make Contact
similars.plot: A joint U.S.-Soviet expedition is sent to Jupiter to learn what happened to the Discovery, and H.A.L.
similars.stars: Roy Scheider, John Lithgow, Helen Mirren

similars.title: Taxi Driver
similars.plot: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action by attempting to liberate a presidential campaign worker and an underage prostitute.
similars.stars: Robert De Niro, Jodie Foster, Cybill Shepherd

similars.title: Barry Lyndon
similars.plot: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.
similars.stars: Ryan O'Neal, Marisa Berenson, Patrick Magee

similars.title: Apocalypse Now
similars.plot: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.
similars.stars: Martin Sheen, Marlon Brando, Robert Duvall

similars.title: Alien
similars.plot: After a space merchant vessel receives an unknown transmission as a distress call, one of the crew is attacked by a mysterious life form and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.
similars.stars: Sigourney Weaver, Tom Skerritt, John Hurt

similars.title: Psycho
similars.plot: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.
similars.stars: Anthony Perkins, Janet Leigh, Vera Miles

similars.title: Reservoir Dogs
similars.plot: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.
similars.stars: Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth, Michael Madsen

similars.title: Blade Runner
similars.plot: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.
similars.stars: Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young
